Description: IN - That you have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health ensure that the exposure of his employees to substances hazardous to health is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled, in particular, that you do not have in place a procedure to monitor and manage the bacterial contamination of your water based metalworking fluids, which are used in machines throughout your factory, and as a consequence employees are being exposed to an increased risk of adverse skin or respiratory conditions.
